```dockerfile
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service"

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libgl1-mesa-glx libglib2.0-0 && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY requirements.txt ./
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --prefix=/install \
    torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir --prefix=/install \
    fastapi uvicorn opencv-python-headless numpy scikit-learn -r requirements.txt

COPY download_model.py ./
RUN python download_model.py

COPY . .

FROM python:3.11-slim AS production

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service"

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl libgl1-mesa-glx libglib2.0-0 && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && \
    addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

COPY --from=builder /install /usr/local
COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt ./model.pt
COPY . .

RUN chown -R appuser:appgroup /app

USER appuser

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

CMD ["python", "-m", "uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
